list_variables.description: The two-letter, uppercase country code for a country that you want to include                   in your blacklist or whitelist.
list_variables.name: Locations
list_variables.required: Conditional. Required if you specified blacklist or                      whitelist for the RestrictionType property.

variables.description: The method to restrict distribution of your content:
variables.name: RestrictionType

variables.description: Prevents viewers in the countries that you specified from accessing                               your content.
variables.name: blacklist

variables.description: Allows viewers in the countries that you specified to access your                               content.
variables.name: whitelist
